title: In defense of 'surveillance pricing': Why personalized prices could be an unexpected force for equity
description: Surveillance pricing has dominated headlines recently. Delta Air Lines' announcement that it will use artificial intelligence to set individualized ticket prices has led to widespread concerns about companies using personal data to charge different prices for identical products. As The New York Times reported, this practice involves companies tracking everything from your hotel bookings to your browsing history to determine what you're willing to pay.

title: Alcor Micro to Showcase Latest Arm-based CPU Platform "Mobius100 (CSS V3)" at OCP Global Summit 2025
description: SAN JOSE, Calif., Oct. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Alcor Micro (8054.TWO), a subsidiary of Egis Technology Inc. (6462.TWO), will participate in the Open Compute Project (OCP) Global Summit 2025 held in San Jose, California, to showcase its latest Arm-based CPU platform - Mobius100 (CSS V3). The 8-core emulation platform is purpose-built for Artificial Intelligence (AI) and High-Performance Computing (HPC) servers, demonstrating Alcor Micro's leadership in open computing innovation and advanced chip architecture.

title: Canada signs non-binding artificial intelligence deal with United Arab Emirates
description: Federal AI Minister Evan Solomon says goal is to attract capital from the Middle East to build data centres in Canada
content:
Ottawa has signed a non-binding deal with the United Arab Emirates to explore investment opportunities related to artificial intelligence, with an eye to attracting capital from the Middle Eastern country to build data centres in Canada.

title: Maharashtra Govt Approves 2,228 New Posts To Strengthen Bombay High Court & Benches
description: The move addresses the long-pending need for additional manpower to ensure faster disposal of cases and smoother court administration. The newly created positions will also support the increased use of information technology and artificial intelligence in court operations, helping to modernize and speed up judicial processes.
content:
Mumbai: Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis, has approved the creation of 2,228 new posts for the Bombay High Court and its benches at Nagpur and Aurangabad. The decision was taken for strengthening the judiciary and expediting court proceedings.
The mo... [869 chars]

title: Walmart, OpenAI partner to create AI shopper tool
description: Walmart and OpenAI have joined forces to offer shoppers the option to buy items by using OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot services in artificial intelligence.
content:
Oct. 14 (UPI) -- Walmart and OpenAI have joined forces to offer shoppers the option to buy items by using OpenAI chatbot services in artificial intelligence.

title: AI investment boom may lead to bust, but not likely systemic crisis, IMF chief economist says
description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -The U.S. artificial intelligence investment boom may be followed by a dot-com-style bust, but it is less likely to be a systemic event that would crater the U.S. or global economy, the International Monetary Fund's chief economist, Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas, said on Tuesday.

title: Google to invest $15 billion in AI data center capacity in India
description: BENGALURU — Google will invest $15 billion over the next five years to set up data center capacity for an artificial intelligence (AI) hub in India’s Andhra Pradesh, the company said on Tuesday, marking one of its biggest-ever investments in the country.

title: Global smartphone shipments rise in Q3 on AI-driven upgrades
description: GLOBAL smartphone shipments grew 2.6 percent in the third quarter (Q3) this year, fueled by strong consumer demand for premium and artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled devices, according to preliminary data from the International Data Corp. on Monday.

title: OpenAI partners with Broadcom to design its own AI chips
description: OPENAI said on Monday it is working with chipmaker Broadcom to design its own artificial intelligence (AI) computer chips.
content:
